Creating and distributing despicable documents which take consumption tax increase tax and Fujita candidate by my side for a long time is an illegal act and language compulsion.

I am going to Malaysia from now on to attend the 10th ASEAN LEADERSHIP FORUM to be held on July 18th.

At the forum, we will hold a keynote address with the theme "Community Building Towards a Common Future & Shared Prosperity", and we are planning to have a meeting with Malaysian Foreign Minister Aman and other ASEAN national guides who will participate.
On the 19th day, I will visit the Malaysian Institute of Technology College (MJIIT) which I asked as the Prime Minister 's envoy in last year.

As Turkey, we have recognized the January 25th revolution as the fight for freedom and honor of the Egyptian people. We have supported this process from the very beginning.
The people of Egypt had a great struggle for freedom, justice and economic development. This is a choice made after a 70 year career.
It is a parliament formed with elections and a President who came to work. The Egyptian people had historical achievements.
We have had an unfortunate development in the establishment of democracy in Egypt.
As Turkey, we are not advocating certain individuals or organizations in Egypt, but a policy that respects universal values ​​and principles.
In Syria, Tunisia, Libya, we acted on these values.
Turkey will be in this difficult time with his sister Egyptian people and will continue his material and spiritual support.
